28
29#ifndef HB_OT_HEAD_TABLE_HH
30#define HB_OT_HEAD_TABLE_HH
31
32#include "hb-open-type.hh"
33
34/*
35 * head -- Font Header
36 * https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/head
37 */
38#define HB_OT_TAG_head HB_TAG('h','e','a','d')
39
40
41namespace OT {
42
43
44struct head
45{
46 friend struct OpenTypeOffsetTable;
47
48 static constexpr hb_tag_t tableTag = HB_OT_TAG_head;
49
50 unsigned int get_upem () const
51 {
52 unsigned int upem = unitsPerEm;
53 /* If no valid head table found, assume 1000, which matches typical Type1 usage. */
54 return 16 <= upem && upem <= 16384 ? upem : 1000;
55 }
56
57 bool serialize (hb_serialize_context_t *c) const
58 {
59 TRACE_SERIALIZE (this);
60 return_trace ((bool) c->embed (this));
61 }
62
63 bool subset (hb_subset_context_t *c) const
64 {
65 TRACE_SUBSET (this);
66 return_trace (serialize (c->serializer));
67 }
68
69 enum mac_style_flag_t {
70 BOLD = 1u<<0,
71 ITALIC = 1u<<1,
72 UNDERLINE = 1u<<2,
73 OUTLINE = 1u<<3,
74 SHADOW = 1u<<4,
75 CONDENSED = 1u<<5,
76 EXPANDED = 1u<<6,
77 };
78
79 bool is_bold () const { return macStyle & BOLD; }
80 bool is_italic () const { return macStyle & ITALIC; }
81 bool is_condensed () const { return macStyle & CONDENSED; }
82 bool is_expanded () const { return macStyle & EXPANDED; }
83
84 bool sanitize (hb_sanitize_context_t *c) const
85 {
86 TRACE_SANITIZE (this);
87 return_trace (c->check_struct (this) &&
88 version.major == 1 &&
89 magicNumber == 0x5F0F3CF5u);
90 }
91
92 protected:
93 FixedVersion<>version; /* Version of the head table--currently
94 * 0x00010000u for version 1.0. */
95 FixedVersion<>fontRevision; /* Set by font manufacturer. */
96 HBUINT32 checkSumAdjustment; /* To compute: set it to 0, sum the
97 * entire font as HBUINT32, then store
98 * 0xB1B0AFBAu - sum. */
99 HBUINT32 magicNumber; /* Set to 0x5F0F3CF5u. */
100 public:
101 HBUINT16 flags; /* Bit 0: Baseline for font at y=0;
102 * Bit 1: Left sidebearing point at x=0;
103 * Bit 2: Instructions may depend on point size;
104 * Bit 3: Force ppem to integer values for all
105 * internal scaler math; may use fractional
106 * ppem sizes if this bit is clear;
107 * Bit 4: Instructions may alter advance width
108 * (the advance widths might not scale linearly);
109 * Bits 5-10: These should be set according to
110 * Apple's specification. However, they are not
111 * implemented in OpenType.
112 * Bit 5: This bit should be set in fonts that are
113 * intended to e laid out vertically, and in
114 * which the glyphs have been drawn such that an
115 * x-coordinate of 0 corresponds to the desired
116 * vertical baseline.
117 * Bit 6: This bit must be set to zero.
118 * Bit 7: This bit should be set if the font
119 * requires layout for correct linguistic
120 * rendering (e.g. Arabic fonts).
121 * Bit 8: This bit should be set for a GX font
122 * which has one or more metamorphosis effects
123 * designated as happening by default.
124 * Bit 9: This bit should be set if the font
125 * contains any strong right-to-left glyphs.
126 * Bit 10: This bit should be set if the font
127 * contains Indic-style rearrangement effects.
128 * Bit 11: Font data is 'lossless,' as a result
129 * of having been compressed and decompressed
130 * with the Agfa MicroType Express engine.
131 * Bit 12: Font converted (produce compatible metrics)
132 * Bit 13: Font optimized for ClearType™.
133 * Note, fonts that rely on embedded bitmaps (EBDT)
134 * for rendering should not be considered optimized
135 * for ClearType, and therefore should keep this bit
136 * cleared.
137 * Bit 14: Last Resort font. If set, indicates that
138 * the glyphs encoded in the cmap subtables are simply
139 * generic symbolic representations of code point
140 * ranges and don’t truly represent support for those
141 * code points. If unset, indicates that the glyphs
142 * encoded in the cmap subtables represent proper
143 * support for those code points.
144 * Bit 15: Reserved, set to 0. */
145 protected:
146 HBUINT16 unitsPerEm; /* Valid range is from 16 to 16384. This value
147 * should be a power of 2 for fonts that have
148 * TrueType outlines. */
149 LONGDATETIME created; /* Number of seconds since 12:00 midnight,
150 January 1, 1904. 64-bit integer */
151 LONGDATETIME modified; /* Number of seconds since 12:00 midnight,
152 January 1, 1904. 64-bit integer */
153 public:
154 HBINT16 xMin; /* For all glyph bounding boxes. */
155 HBINT16 yMin; /* For all glyph bounding boxes. */
156 HBINT16 xMax; /* For all glyph bounding boxes. */
157 HBINT16 yMax; /* For all glyph bounding boxes. */
158 protected:
159 HBUINT16 macStyle; /* Bit 0: Bold (if set to 1);
160 * Bit 1: Italic (if set to 1)
161 * Bit 2: Underline (if set to 1)
162 * Bit 3: Outline (if set to 1)
163 * Bit 4: Shadow (if set to 1)
164 * Bit 5: Condensed (if set to 1)
165 * Bit 6: Extended (if set to 1)
166 * Bits 7-15: Reserved (set to 0). */
167 HBUINT16 lowestRecPPEM; /* Smallest readable size in pixels. */
168 HBINT16 fontDirectionHint; /* Deprecated (Set to 2).
169 * 0: Fully mixed directional glyphs;
170 * 1: Only strongly left to right;
171 * 2: Like 1 but also contains neutrals;
172 * -1: Only strongly right to left;
173 * -2: Like -1 but also contains neutrals. */
174 public:
175 HBUINT16 indexToLocFormat; /* 0 for short offsets, 1 for long. */
176 HBUINT16 glyphDataFormat; /* 0 for current format. */
177
178 DEFINE_SIZE_STATIC (54);
179};
180
181
182} /* namespace OT */
183
184
185#endif /* HB_OT_HEAD_TABLE_HH */
186
